overview: Suri, as his friends and family and anyone he doesn’t hate calls him, grew up in Dubai and received an MBA with a concentration in HR. He has over 7 years of experience in the digital media industry, specifically with Ad Operations, Publisher Operations, Sales, and Account Management. Martini is Suri’s fourth start-up (two of which have been acquired, namely Adify for $300M); he currently manages the Pub Ops and Client Services team at Martini. His interests include riding motorcycles, traveling, and cricket

relationships.title: Director of Publisher Operations & Client Services
